content.en: Polarization navigation algorithms: Scientists have been exploring the use of algorithms in polarization navigation sensors to improve accuracy and measurement precision. These algorithms, such as linear least-squares and machine-vision algorithms, are used to calculate angles, estimate orientation, and measure polarization patterns. By incorporating these algorithms, researchers hope to enhance navigation capabilities in various weather conditions and improve the performance of polarization sensors.
content.da: Polarisations-navigationsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer i polarisationsnavigationssensorer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden og målepræcisionen. Disse algoritmer, såsom lineære kvadraters metode og maskinsynsalgoritmer, bruges til at beregne vinkler, estimere orientering og måle polarisationsmønstre. Ved at integrere disse algoritmer håber forskerne at forbedre navigationskapaciteterne under forskellige vejrforhold og forbedre præstationen af polarisationssensorer.
